    Get the Anvil and modify it's values directly

    PlayerDeathHook
    Player Death hook
    PlayerIdleHook
    Player Idle Hook

    Called when a Player is idle for too long and just before them being kicked for idling.
    Canceling this hook will stop the kicking process.
    NOTE: This hook only fires if PlayerIdle time is set above 0 in the sever.cfg and for Player(s) who aren't set to ignoresRestrictions
    PlayerListHook
    PlayerListHook

    Called when a Player information is sent to another Player
